description: PSR ISO steering overcorrecting at high speed
recommended_action: Reduce steering gain parameter - check hydraulic oil temp - recalibrate at field speed

description: PSR ISO not engaging - ISOBUS error on display
recommended_action: Verify ISOBUS cable connections - check steering controller power - update controller firmware

description: PSR Top motor slipping on steering column
recommended_action: Retorque column clamp - verify correct adapter for tractor model - inspect motor gear

description: PSR Top motor buzzing but not turning wheel
recommended_action: Check motor engagement mechanism - verify power supply adequate - inspect column adapter fit

description: ISOBUS controller not detected by third-party display
recommended_action: Verify ISOBUS termination - check controller node address not conflicting - update firmware

description: JD valve kit hydraulic leak at T-fitting
recommended_action: Retorque fittings - check O-rings - verify correct fitting size for JD model year

description: CNH valve kit slow steering response
recommended_action: Check hydraulic oil level - verify valve spool not sticking - bleed air from steering circuit

description: AGCO valve kit causing steering wheel kick on disengage
recommended_action: Adjust valve transition timing - check return-to-manual speed parameter - update controller

description: Wheel angle sensor reading drift over time
recommended_action: Re-zero sensor on straight - check mounting bracket tight - inspect for metal debris near sensor

description: PSR Implement steering hunting in soft soil
recommended_action: Reduce implement steering gain - check hydraulic cylinder response - verify GPS accuracy

description: Touch Steer haptic feedback too weak or too strong
recommended_action: Adjust feedback intensity in display settings - check knob mounting - verify CAN communication
